CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c)), TEXT( YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c) - IF( DATE( YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), MIN( DAY(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), CASE( MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4, 30,6, 30,9, 30,11, 30,31 ) ) ) > TODAY(), 1, 0 ) ) & " Tahun, " & TEXT( MOD( ( MONTH(TODAY()) + 12 - MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c) - IF( DAY(TODAY()) < MIN( DAY(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), CASE( MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4,30,6,30,9,30,11,30,31 ) ), 1, 0 ) ), 12 ) ) & " Bulan, " & TEXT( IF( DAY(TODAY()) >= MIN( DAY(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), CASE( MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4,30,6,30,9,30,11,30,31 ) ), DAY(TODAY()) - MIN( DAY(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), CASE( MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4,30,6,30,9,30,11,30,31 ) ), CASE( MONTH(TODAY()), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4,30,6,30,9,30,11,30,31 ) - MIN( DAY(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), CASE( MONTH(Contact__r.WelcomeCall_Effective_Date__c), 2, IF( OR( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 400)=0, AND( MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 4)=0, MOD(YEAR(TODAY()), 100)<>0 ) ), 29,28),4,30,6,30,9,30,11,30,31 ) ) + DAY(TODAY()) ) ) & " Hari",
"" )
CustomField.label: Field Aging
